articles.author: Rod McGuirk
articles.title: WWI soldiers’ messages in a bottle found on Australian beach more than 100 years later - AP News
articles.description: Messages in a bottle written by two World War I soldiers have been discovered on Australia's coast. The Brown family found the bottle on Oct. 9 at Wharton Beach in Western Australia. Inside were letters from Australian soldiers Malcolm Neville and William Har…
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) Messages in a bottle written by two Australian soldiers a few days into their voyage to the battlefields of France during World War I have been found more than a century lat… [+3190 chars]
